description:
The shuffling of character rosters ramps up! And suddenly, Mio-senpai, the former captain of the Tesaguri Club, appears! Even with her peculiar pace and mysterious tone that throws the proceedings into confusion, the shuffled members think of "new field trips". The second half features an unheard-of "location recording" at an amusement park.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Play with Field Trips and Haunted Houses
遠足とお化け屋敷で遊ぼう
